channel.title: Engadget
channel.description: Engadget is a web magazine with obsessive daily coverage of everything new in gadgets and consumer electronics
channel.copyright: Copyright (c) 2021 Yahoo! Inc. All rights reserved

item.title: The best affordable Windows laptops you can buy
item.description: Here's a list of the best affordable Windows laptops you can buy, as reviewed by Engadget editors.

item.title: ASUS ROG goes big with the 16-inch Zephyrus M16 and 17-inch S17
item.description: ASUS is ready to debut two new big-screen gaming laptops, the Zephyrus M16 and S17.

item.title: Colonial pipeline hackers say they're 'apolitical' and only out to make money
item.description: The Darkside hacking group believed to be behind the rasomware on the Colonial pipeline has said it is "apolitical" in a statement.

item.title: The Morning After: Xbox Series X and PS5 progress update
item.description: After half a year with the new consoles, what do you think of the PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X?

item.title: NVIDIA's RTX 3050 and 3050 Ti bring ray tracing to affordable laptops
item.description: NVIDIA is officially unveiling the RTX 3050 and 3050 Ti. They deliver the ray tracing and AI features from the rest of its RTX line, but with a much lower starting price around $799.

item.title: Razer upgrades its Blade 15 laptop with 11th-gen Intel H-series chips
item.description: Razer is launching an upgraded Blade Advanced 15-inch gaming laptop armed with Intelâ€™s latest 11th Gen H-series chips.

item.title: Alienware teases new X-Series laptops with exotic cooling solution
item.description: Dell has teased an upcoming Alienware laptop lineup called the X-Series offering improved thermal performance using new materials.

item.title: NVIDIA's Broadcast app gains echo and video noise removal in new update
item.description: NVIDIA has made it easier to remove room echo, sounds of pets and video noise with the latest version of its Broadcast app.

item.title: HP boosts its ZBook laptops with new Intel chips and punchy displays
item.description: HP is releasing a new range of ZBook work-oriented laptops featuring Intel's latest processors and 4K displays.

item.title: Lenovo updates Legion gaming laptops with 11th-gen Intel H-series chips
item.description: Lenovo has unveiled a trio of Legion gaming laptops that boast both 11th-generation Intel Core H-series chips as well as NVIDIA's GeForce RTX 3050 graphics.

item.title: Dell's latest XPS laptops pack ray-traced graphics into the same slim frame
item.description: Dell has unveiled its latest XPS laptops using Intel's newly launched 11th-generation CPUs, and they have some impressive specs and looks.

item.title: Intel's 11th-gen H-series CPUs are finally ready for powerful gaming laptops
item.description: Intel's powerful 11th-gen H-series chips are finally here.

item.title: Acer updates its gaming laptops with the latest Intel and NVIDIA chips
item.description: Tiger Lake H-series chips come to three of Acer's laptops.

item.title: SkulptSynth SE is a $199 portable virtual analog synth with MPE support
item.description: The SkulptSynth SE builds on the success of the original by cutting the price to $199 and improving the build quality.

item.title: NASA's OSIRIS-REx asteroid probe begins its two-year journey back to Earth
item.description: On May 10th at 4:23 PM Eastern, OSIRISâ€”REx bid asteroid Bennu farewell to begin its 1.4-billion-mile journey back to our planet.

item.title: 'Among Us' builds in Twitch streaming and Discord invites on mobile
item.description: 'Among Us' updates are making it easier to use Twitch and Discord with the game, especially on mobile.

item.title: FCC approves $7 billion internet fund to connect schools and libraries
item.description: The FCC has announced two significant developments that will help more people get connected during the COVID-19 pandemic.

item.title: What's on TV this week: 'Mass Effect,' 'Love, Death & Robots' and 'Castlevania'
item.description: Also new this week: 'Subnautica: Below Zero,' 'Intergalactic' and 'Shrek' in 4K.

item.title: Sony's DualSense controller now works with Apple devices for PS5 remote play
item.description: You'll be able to use your DualSense controller to remote play PS5 games on your Apple devices.

item.title: IBM's CodeNet dataset can teach AI to translate computer languages
item.description: IBM researchers have crafted a Rosetta Stone for programming code.

item.title: Valorant's Replication mode puts five identical agents on one team
item.description: With Replication, you and your team can all play the same agent.

item.title: NTSB: Video shows owner getting into driver's seat before fatal Tesla crash
item.description: The National Transportation Safety Board (NTSB) has released its preliminary report on the fatal Tesla Model S crash that killed two men in Texas last month.

item.title: WhatsApp will gradually stop working if you don't agree to its new privacy policy
item.description: With its controversial privacy policy slated to go into effect this weekend, WhatsApp says it won't delete or deactivate the accounts of individuals who don't want to share their information with Facebook.

item.title: 'Gears 5' studio is moving to Unreal Engine 5 for 'next-gen development'
item.description: The Coalition says not to expect new game announcements anytime soon.

item.title: Facebook test encourages people to read articles before sharing
item.description: Facebook has started testing a new interface feature that will prompt people to at least open a link before they share it with their network.
